# Piyush Paul

> Full-Stack Developer & Backend Engineer

## About

Piyush Paul is a Full-Stack Developer and Backend Engineer specializing in Python, Next.js, Flask, React, and cloud-native architectures. Building scalable systems, security tools, and modern web applications.

## Links

- Portfolio: https://piyushpaul.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/Piyush800x
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/piyushpaul/
- Medium: https://medium.com/@piyush_paul
- Email: contact@piyushpaul.com

## Projects

- [AstroRoni](https://astroroni.com): Full-stack Vedic astrology platform with NASA ephemeris-based Kundli generation, 36 Guna matching, numerology, and NRI-friendly consultation booking.
- [RiskRadar](https://riskradar.piyushpaul.com): Vulnerability detection and alerting software that tracks CVEs and notifies users when their products are affected.
- [Online Exam Panel](https://exam-panel.piyushpaul.com): Fully automated examination platform with admin controls, flexible exam creation, and instant result delivery.
- [TimeZonesNow](https://timezone.piyushpaul.com): World clock and time zone converter — 2nd Place winner at Code Circuit Frontend Hackathon.

## Skills

- Backend: Python, Node.js, Java, C++, Rust
- Frontend: JavaScript, React, Next.js, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS
- Frameworks: Flask, Django, Spring Boot
- Database & Cloud: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, GCP, AWS
- Tools & DevOps: Git, Docker, Linux, Redis, Shell Scripting, Postman

## Experience

- Freelance Backend Developer at Fluencer Market (Dec 2024 — Apr 2025)

- B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, JIS College of Engineering (2025 — 2028)
